Ellipse Profile Definition
==========================



```
concept {
    IfcEllipseProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcEllipseProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcEllipseProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D
    IfcEllipseProfileDef:SemiAxis1 -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_0
    IfcEllipseProfileDef:SemiAxis2 -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_1
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:RefDirection -> IfcDirection
}
```
